Gatekeeper Spicula:
Hello! My name is Spicula. I was awakened by the voice of the Giants, and my mission is their resurrection. Using the power of the runes, I'm on for a while distorting space. In other words, lets you instantly move into elsewhere. I'm helping those that are looking for the body of the Giants.
For a small fee I will provide this service and degenerated wars that can use the runes high measurements. The money will be used to purchase gold for the restoration of the host body. I encourage you to use my teleport!
